meeting_info.organization: Tax Increment Financing Reinvestment Zone Number Fourteen Board of Directors

presenters: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 6.
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the December 6, 2024, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a request by the Cityâ€™s Department of Transportation and Public Works for a dedication of funds.
agenda_items.description: A request for a dedication of up to $1,100,000 in the Skillman Corridor TIF District district-wide set-aside funds to support the construction of median improvements and parkway edge landscaping on Skillman Street.
agenda_items.presenter: Cameron Anderson, P.E., Program Manager, Department of Transportation and Public Works
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of Approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and discuss updates to the 2009 Skillman Corridor TIF District Strategic Implementation Plan.

financial_items.description: Dedication of funds for median improvements and landscaping on Skillman Street.
